title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations in the package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. The package view initializes the search dialog with the fully qualified name, which is not found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
OB: When searching for declarations in the package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: The search in the package view selection and dialog should display the search results correctly.
SR:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click on a Java element.
4. Choose the 'Search' option.
5. Observe that no search results are displayed.
